author: scoobytoobins
post_text: January 23, 2018 at 6:56â€¯PM#1I'm trying, and having tons of difficulty, to write a macro that will change the destination of MIDI notes.For example, let's say Song 1 is playing and MIDI notes 1-50 will trigger cues 1-50. Simple.Then, hypothetical Macro is run for Song 2, and MIDI notes 1-50 will now trigger cues 1-50 on Song 2. The same macro but for Song 3 is run and then MIDI notes 1-50 will trigger cues 1-50 of Song 3. I'm having trouble accessing MIDI settings in the command line which is halting me from being able to make this macro. Any advice?Thanks in advance!
title: MIDI change macro
